name: Interface CSSMediaRule
text:
The CSSMediaRule interface represents a @media rule in a CSS
 style sheet. A @media rule can be used to delimit style
 rules for specific media types.
 See also the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Style Specification.

methods.description: A list of media types for this rule.
A list of all CSS rules contained within the media block.

methods.method_sig:
int insertRule (String rule,
               int index)
        throws DOMException
methods.description: Used to insert a new rule into the media block.
Used to delete a rule from the media block.
